locate_gatekeeper.title: Find the Gate Keeper
locate_gatekeeper.description: Small hut with a special trader. The Gate Keeper holds the portal towards the next dimension.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Found the Gate Keeper hourse! Trade with him to get a Zeal Lighter

get_zeal_lighter.title: Get a Zeal Lighter
get_zeal_lighter.description: Trade with the Gate Keeper to obtain a zeal lighter. Use it to fire the portal that must lay near by.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Zeal lighter acquired. Light the way towards the Blue Skies!

20combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 20
20combatlvl.description: Everbright is for no weak souls. Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 20.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Level 20 reached for combat! Now you are ready for the Everbright
